metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1720 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Buffer Over-read in function grab_file_name in GitHub repository vim/vim prior to 8.2.4956. This vulnerability is capable of crashing the software, memory modification, and possible remote execution.

notes.Note: eslerm> patch breaks tilde test on xenial

criterions.comment: vim: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'changes too intrusive').
